name: Mailmodo
headline: No-code email marketing platform to send forms & widgets within emails
description: Mailmodo is an email marketing software that helps marketers create app-like experiences in email by adding forms, shopping cart, calendar, NPS and more widgets within the email. Our interactive emails reduce the number of steps for users, thereby increasing email conversions. You can use it to collect feedback from your users, book meetings with prospects, recover abandon carts, generate leads, and more all within emails.

founders.name: Apurv Gupta, Co-founder, CPO
founders.description: Apurv Gupta is a seasoned technology leader and serial entrepreneur with over 13 years of experience in building and scaling B2B SaaS startups. As the Co-founder and Chief Product Officer of Mailmodo, he has led product strategy and planning, served a variety of customers across industries, and built high-performing engineering teams. Previously, he co-founded Flick2Know, where he led the development of FieldAssist, scaling it to $3M ARR without external funding.

founders.name: Aquibur Rahman, Co-founder, CEO
founders.description: Aquibur Rahman is a growth-focused entrepreneur and marketing leader, currently building Mailmodo, a B2B SaaS platform that helps businesses achieve 3x higher conversions through interactive, app-like widgets inside emails. As the CEO and Co-founder, he has led the company’s vision, driving product adoption and customer growth. Previously, he headed marketing at Cleartax, growing organic traffic 5x in one year, scaling CleartaxGST to 600,000+ signups, and driving multi-crore AUM in mutual funds.

## Frequently asked questions
Everything you need to know about the product and billing
### Does Mailmodo create/send only interactive emails?
![chevron-down](https://res.cloudinary.com/mailmodo/image/upload/v1709192440/strapi/Group_1110166161_d90f898a11.svg)
Mailmodo enables but is not limited to creating and sending of interactive emails. You can create, send and automate both HTML and interactive AMP email campaigns without any dev intervention.
### What is AMP for email?
![chevron-down](https://res.cloudinary.com/mailmodo/image/upload/v1709192440/strapi/Group_1110166161_d90f898a11.svg)
AMP email is an open-source framework created by Google that allows emails to render and display dynamic elements like accordions, carousels, forms, calendars, shopping carts, dynamic APIs, etc. It creates a mini-website inside an email.
### Are there any limitations of interactive emails created with Mailmodo?
![chevron-down](https://res.cloudinary.com/mailmodo/image/upload/v1709192440/strapi/Group_1110166161_d90f898a11.svg)
Mailmodo used both AMP for Email and CSS Interactivity to cover major email clients so that your email subscribers get unique email experiences. Even though at present, AMP email is supported only by Gmail, GSuite, Yahoo, Fair.email, and Mail.ru, we have innovated to extend the interactive experience to Apple Mail as well. Moreover, if a user's email client doesn't support AMP or CSS interactivity, the recipient will see a plain HTML fallback email we provide options for. 
### Can I send interactive emails from my current platform? 
![chevron-down](https://res.cloudinary.com/mailmodo/image/upload/v1709192440/strapi/Group_1110166161_d90f898a11.svg)
Most likely, no. If you are planning to use AMP for email to do this, most ESPs don't support sending AMP emails. At present, we do not export interactive emails to be used with any external platform. However, you can use Mailmodo integrations to send interactive emails from other platforms. This way you can get the best of both worlds. If you are interested in the template export feature, please let us know at aquib@mailmodo.com.
### Do I have to switch from my current email tool to use Mailmodo?
![chevron-down](https://res.cloudinary.com/mailmodo/image/upload/v1709192440/strapi/Group_1110166161_d90f898a11.svg)
Not necessarily. Mailmodo is a complete email marketing platform that offers the same functionality as your ESP. But if you'd prefer not to switch, Mailmodo offers a range of integrations with email tools, CRMs and marketing analytics platforms to make your experience seamless.
### Can I send transactional emails with Mailmodo?
![chevron-down](https://res.cloudinary.com/mailmodo/image/upload/v1709192440/strapi/Group_1110166161_d90f898a11.svg)
Of course. Mailmodo's API for Transactional Email enables developers to set up transactional email campaigns using REST API without having to code the emails.

## Frequently asked questions
Everything you need to know about the product and billing
### Does Mailmodo create/send only interactive emails?
![chevron-down⟨92⟩]
Mailmodo enables but is not limited to creating and sending of interactive emails. You can create, send and automate both HTML and interactive AMP email campaigns without any dev intervention.
### What is AMP for email?
![chevron-down⟨92⟩]
AMP email is an open-source framework created by Google that allows emails to render and display dynamic elements like accordions, carousels, forms, calendars, shopping carts, dynamic APIs, etc. It creates a mini-website inside an email.
### Are there any limitations of interactive emails created with Mailmodo?
![chevron-down⟨92⟩]
Mailmodo used both AMP for Email and CSS Interactivity to cover major email clients so that your email subscribers get unique email experiences. Even though at present, AMP email is supported only by Gmail, GSuite, Yahoo, Fair.email, and Mail.ru, we have innovated to extend the interactive experience to Apple Mail as well. Moreover, if a user's email client doesn't support AMP or CSS interactivity, the recipient will see a plain HTML fallback email we provide options for. 
### Can I send interactive emails from my current platform? 
![chevron-down⟨92⟩]
Most likely, no. If you are planning to use AMP for email to do this, most ESPs don't support sending AMP emails. At present, we do not export interactive emails to be used with any external platform. However, you can use Mailmodo integrations to send interactive emails from other platforms. This way you can get the best of both worlds. If you are interested in the template export feature, please let us know at aquib@mailmodo.com.
### Do I have to switch from my current email tool to use Mailmodo?
![chevron-down⟨92⟩]
Not necessarily. Mailmodo is a complete email marketing platform that offers the same functionality as your ESP. But if you'd prefer not to switch, Mailmodo offers a range of integrations with email tools, CRMs and marketing analytics platforms to make your experience seamless.
### Can I send transactional emails with Mailmodo?
![chevron-down⟨92⟩]
Of course. Mailmodo's API for Transactional Email enables developers to set up transactional email campaigns using REST API without having to code the emails.

generated_description:
**Mailmodo: Transforming Email Engagement with Interactivity**

Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator’s Summer 2021 batch, Mailmodo is an innovative no-code email marketing platform based in San Francisco. With a team of 70 talented individuals, the company is on a mission to redefine how we interact with emails.

### What is Mailmodo all about?

At its core, Mailmodo empowers marketers to create app-like experiences right within emails. Gone are the days of rigid, static messages. With Mailmodo, you can embed forms, shopping carts, calendars, NPS surveys, and other interactive widgets directly into your emails. This approach reduces the number of steps for users, leading to higher conversion rates—from collecting feedback to booking meetings or recovering abandoned carts, it’s all possible right from the inbox.

### Key Features

Mailmodo’s platform comes packed with practical features:

- **Drag & Drop Editor:** Design stunning emails effortlessly, no coding required.
- **Interactive AMP Emails:** Utilize AMP (Accelerated Mobile Pages) to enhance engagement and deliver dynamic content.
- **Mailmodo AI for Email:** Get assistance with composing subject lines, writing pre-headers, and reviewing email copy, leveraging AI to optimize your email campaigns.
- **Smart Segmentation:** Tailor campaigns based on user engagement and behavior for precise targeting.
- **Managed Deliverability:** Trust that your emails will land in inboxes, thanks to expert monitoring of your domain and IP reputation.
- **Automated Email Journeys:** Set up automated workflows with prebuilt templates for various marketing scenarios.

### Use Cases

Companies are seeing tangible success using Mailmodo’s interactive emails:
- **Foundit** achieved a 400% increase in registrations via interactive forms.
- **BluSmart** experienced a 35% boost in engagement by integrating interactive quizzes.
- **Razorpay** collected 257% more feedback through surveys embedded in emails.

### Global Footprint

Mailmodo has established itself as a trusted platform, serving over 5,000 businesses across 20 countries. Supported by significant backing, it continues to broaden the scope of what email marketing can achieve on a global scale.

### Why Mailmodo?

As traditional email marketing platforms struggle to keep up with rising user expectations for interactivity, Mailmodo not only meets the challenge but excels. The platform is designed with user-friendliness as a priority, allowing marketers to create highly engaging content without the need for technical knowledge.

You can explore their offerings and see how Mailmodo can elevate your email marketing game [here](https://www.mailmodo.com/). Whether you're looking to drive engagement, capture leads, or simply make your emails more enjoyable for your audience, Mailmodo is a no-brainer choice for fast-growing companies aiming to stand out in an overcrowded inbox.
